abstract: Federal grand jury upgrades charges filed against former Rikers Island correction Officer Brian Coll for his role in 2012 death of inmate Ronald Spear, directly implicating him in Spear's death.
lead_paragraph: Already implicated in the beating death of Ronald Spear, Brian Coll could face up to life in prison after a federal grand jury charged him on Tuesday with directly causing Mr. Spear’s death.

headline.main: New Charge Against Ex-Rikers Guard Accused in Inmate’s 2012 Death
headline.print_headline: Ex-Officer Faces New Charge in Rikers Death

snippet: Already implicated in the beating death of Ronald Spear, Brian Coll could face up to life in prison after a federal grand jury charged him on Tuesday with directly causing Mr. Spear’s death.
